html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-04872011-03-25,  ,  ,  ,  ,  JUS, 
ActCriminal Code
SubjectRegulations Amending the Regulations Respecting Applications for Ministerial Review - Miscarriages of Justice (Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations Amending the REGULATIONS RESPECTING APPLICATIONS FOR MINISTERIAL REVIEW - MISCARRIAGES OF JUSTICE (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM), in order to clarify the requirements as to what information should accompany an application to the Minister when seeking a formal conviction review under section 696.1 of the Criminal Code (Miscarriages of Justice) and to ensure symmetry of the French and English version of the text. The amendments address comments made by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0097 Publication Date: 2011-04-13
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Regulations Respecting Applications for Ministerial Review - Miscarriages of Justice (Miscellaneous Program)
precis: Regulations Amending the REGULATIONS RESPECTING APPLICATIONS FOR MINISTERIAL REVIEW - MISCARRIAGES OF JUSTICE (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM), in order to clarify the requirements as to what information should accompany an application to the Minister when seeking a formal conviction review under section 696.1 of the Criminal Code (Miscarriages of Justice) and to ensure symmetry of the French and English version of the text.  The amendments address comments made by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations.
